attributes.action: Make a skatepark in Appleby, Cumbria
attributes.additional_details: My friends and I have decided to start a petition and it would be really helpful if everyone can get behind us on this and help us get a skatepark.
attributes.background: We find it challenging to ride around town without annoying pedestrians, shoppers, etc, so a skatepark would be beneficial for the community. Most other towns across the country have a skatepark or some recreational space for people to use.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
